form.service_engineer: Service Engineer / Rep has been Relieved After Satisfactory Completion of Job
form.zero_hr: Zero Hr Defect:(In Case Of first Time Commissioning)
form.caption: Additional Photo
form.doorkeyre: Compressor Door Key received or not
form.were: Were Compressor Stored properly or not
form.removered: Remove red color support & brackets from base frame
form.ballvalvescheck: Check ball valves (main line & manual drain) condition
form.allelec: Check all electrical connection are tight
form.allconnect: Check all connection inside control panel are tight or not
form.hosewellventi: Compressor Hose well ventilated & pollution free
form.gapbetw: Gap between walls & compressor's is adequate
form.areaaroundcomp: Area around compressor is clean, non dusty & dry
form.indicateexact: Indicate exact condition of compressor room
form.checkwhethercom: Check whether combustible items are kept around 10 meters of radius
form.temparound: Temperature around compressor should be between - 5 to 450C.
form.fireextingui: Fire extinguisher installed inside compressor room
form.airflowfanven: Check adequate air flow fan for ventilation is installed inside room.(Air flow quantity of fan's should be number of compressors installed inside the compressor room.)
form.refermanual: Refer manual guidelines for fan flow Velocity across fan should not exceed 5-6 m/s
form.shimsrubber: Shims / Rubber pads placed below compressor
form.airsuctionside: Air suction side of compressor faced towards fresh air supply
form.hotairother: Hot air of other compressors diverted outside compressor room
form.baseframe: Use of base frame opening for cable supply
form.allconnectoninside: All connection inside control panel tightened
form.cablesizeprovided: Cable size provided(Write down cable size provided by customer)
form.manualdiagram: Manual & wiring diagram gives general guideline.Refer manufacturer catalogue for exact size.
form.paintonmotor: Paint on motor or panel to be removed before fixing earthing line
form.moistseparator: Moisture separator auto drain connected to drain line
form.manuldrain: Moisture separator manul drain connected to drain line
form.checkcorrect: Check correct size pipeline is provided
form.checknrv: Check NRV is provided after ball value
form.dryeroff: Dryer & disposed off as per statutory norms
form.nonstd: Non-STD Compressor Commissioning refer approved QAP
form.aostank: AOS tank make/vendor code & SI. No:
form.commonth: Compressor is commissioned within 6 months from date supply
form.compcomm: Check whether compressor commissioned with in 6 months from date of dispatch.Indicate in this report
form.remove: Remove all red colour supports and brackets
form.perwiring: Check as per wiring diagram & looseness
form.drainline: Check whether it is connected to drain line
form.ballvalve: Check ball valve is closed & plug is fixed
form.pouroil: Pour oil level which should be middle of oil level glass
form.levelmiddle: Check for oil level which should be middle of oil level glass
form.removeairfilter: Remove & check air filter condition.Check for proper tightening
form.hrcfusesdia: Check electrical supply line & HRC fuses are as per wiring diagram.Mention size in this report
form.connectballvalve: Connect ball valve to air line after checking all parameters.
form.ballvalv: Check for microcontroller setting.Correct if required.
form.motorrotation: Ensure direction of rotation of motor is as per recommendation.
form.alignbelt: Check belt alignment for belt driven compressors.
form.belttensions: Check belt tension for belt driven compressors.
form.hosing: Check hosing sealing Condition.Damage if any
form.elementcond: Check element condition(both inner & outer) Physical Condition if any
form.airfilterelement: Air filter element wing nut & Sealing washer
form.checkcracked: Check if cracked &during full load of compressor(red indication coming or not)
form.hosesystem: Air system Hose & metalic pipe condition
form.physicalconditionjoint: Check for Physical Conditions & leakage from joint
form.joint: Check for Physical Condition, joint tightness & leakage
form.joint1: Check for Physical Condition, joint tightness & leakage
form.discharge: Check Pressure difference between discharge & AOS tank pressure gauges
form.hose_aos: Hose condition on AOS taken top
form.air_leakagework: Check for air leakage & working condition.Check pressure maintained in AOS tank when ball is in fully open condition.
form.check_chock: Check for Physical Conditions, chocking & leakages
form.boltmissing: Check for Physical Conditions & bolt missing & tightening
form.checkmissing: Check for Physical Conditions & bolt missing & tightening
form.end_rotating: Check Air end rotating or not
form.leakage_con: Check for Physical Condition, joint tightness & leakage
form.operation: Check for Physical Condition & operation (Check air oil temperature)
form.operatio: Check for Physical Condition & operating operation
form.visual: Check for Physical Condition, visual & oil level
form.boltmissings: Check for Physical Condition & bolt missing & tightening
form.fangaurd: Check for Physical Condition & alignment wrt fan gaurd.(Gap between fan & guard should equal at all locations.Fan should be 2/3 inside of fan cowl for sucker & outside of cowl for pusher)
form.joints: Check air leakages of all joints of cooling System(fan cowl, cooler &canopy parts)
form.leakagerounting: Check for Physical Condition & leakages from joints.Also check for rounting of hoses
form.wocon: Check for Physical Condition & working condition
form.worcon: Check for Physical Condition & working condition
form.drilling: Check for Physical Condition,working condition, drilling RPM & hunting
form.extdamage: Check for external damage, functioning & any noise
form.fundamag: Check for external damage, functioning & any noise
